00048 #define FIXCC(fcc) \
00049     { \
00050         if (fcc == 0)       { fcc = mmioFOURCC('N', 'o', 'n', 'e'); } \
00051         if (fcc == BI_RLE8) { fcc = mmioFOURCC('R', 'l', 'e', '8'); } \
00052     }

00054 #endif

00133 
00134 static int an_stringdec(const char *string, char* head, char *tail, unsigned short *numlen)
00135 {
00136     unsigned short len,nume,nums=0;
00137     short i,found=FALSE;
00138 
00139     len=strlen(string);
00140     nume = len;
00141 
00142     for (i=len-1;i>=0;i--) {
00143         if (string[i]==PATHSEPERATOR) break;
00144         if (isdigit(string[i])) {
00145             if (found) {
00146                 nums=i;
00147             }
00148             else {
00149                 nume=i;
00150                 nums=i;
00151                 found=TRUE;
00152             }
00153         }
00154         else {
00155             if (found) break;
00156         }
00157     }
00158     if (found) {
00159         strcpy(tail ,&string[nume+1]);
00160         strcpy(head, string);
00161         head[nums]= '\0';
00162         *numlen=nume-nums+1;
00163         return ((int)atoi(&(string[nums])));
00164     }
00165     tail[0]= '\0';
00166     strcpy(head, string);
00167     *numlen=0;
00168     return TRUE;
00169 }

00177 static void free_anim_avi (struct anim *anim)
00178 {
00179 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(FREE_WINDOWS)
00180     int i;
00181 #endif
00182 
00183     if (anim == NULL) return;
00184     if (anim->avi == NULL) return;
00185 
00186     AVI_close (anim->avi);
00187     MEM_freeN (anim->avi);
00188     anim->avi = NULL;
00189 
00190 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(FREE_WINDOWS)
00191 
00192     if (anim->pgf) {
00193         AVIStreamGetFrameClose(anim->pgf);
00194         anim->pgf = NULL;
00195     }
00196 
00197     for (i = 0; i < anim->avistreams; i++) {
00198         AVIStreamRelease(anim->pavi[i]);
00199     }
00200     anim->avistreams = 0;
00201 
00202     if (anim->pfileopen) {
00203         AVIFileRelease(anim->pfile);
00204         anim->pfileopen = 0;
00205         AVIFileExit();
00206     }
00207 #endif
00208 
00209     anim->duration = 0;
00210 }

00219 void IMB_free_anim(struct anim * anim)
00220 {
00221     if (anim == NULL) {
00222         printf("free anim, anim == NULL\n");
00223         return;
00224     }
00225 
00226     free_anim_movie(anim);
00227     free_anim_avi(anim);
00228 
00229 #ifdef WITH_QUICKTIME
00230     free_anim_quicktime(anim);
00231 #endif
00232 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00233     free_anim_ffmpeg(anim);
00234 #endif
00235 #ifdef WITH_REDCODE
00236     free_anim_redcode(anim);
00237 #endif
00238     IMB_free_indices(anim);
00239 
00240     MEM_freeN(anim);
00241 }

00258 struct anim * IMB_open_anim( const char * name, int ib_flags, int streamindex)
00259 {
00260     struct anim * anim;
00261 
00262     anim = (struct anim*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct anim), "anim struct");
00263     if (anim != NULL) {
00264         BLI_strncpy(anim->name, name, sizeof(anim->name));
00265         anim->ib_flags = ib_flags;
00266         anim->streamindex = streamindex;
00267     }
00268     return(anim);
00269 }

00272 static int startavi (struct anim *anim)
00273 {
00274 
00275     AviError avierror;
00276 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(FREE_WINDOWS)
00277     HRESULT hr;
00278     int i, firstvideo = -1;
00279     int streamcount;
00280     BYTE abFormat[1024];
00281     LONG l;
00282     LPBITMAPINFOHEADER lpbi;
00283     AVISTREAMINFO avis;
00284 
00285     streamcount = anim->streamindex;
00286 #endif
00287 
00288     anim->avi = MEM_callocN (sizeof(AviMovie),"animavi");
00289 
00290     if (anim->avi == NULL) {
00291         printf("Can't open avi: %s\n", anim->name);
00292         return -1;
00293     }
00294 
00295     avierror = AVI_open_movie (anim->name, anim->avi);
00296 
00297 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(FREE_WINDOWS)
00298     if (avierror == AVI_ERROR_COMPRESSION) {
00299         AVIFileInit();
00300         hr = AVIFileOpen(&anim->pfile, anim->name, OF_READ, 0L);
00301         if (hr == 0) {
00302             anim->pfileopen = 1;
00303             for (i = 0; i < MAXNUMSTREAMS; i++) {
00304                 if (AVIFileGetStream(anim->pfile, &anim->pavi[i], 0L, i) != AVIERR_OK) {
00305                     break;
00306                 }
00307                 
00308                 AVIStreamInfo(anim->pavi[i], &avis, sizeof(avis));
00309                 if ((avis.fccType == streamtypeVIDEO) && (firstvideo == -1)) {
00310                     if (streamcount > 0) {
00311                         streamcount--;
00312                         continue;
00313                     }
00314                     anim->pgf = AVIStreamGetFrameOpen(anim->pavi[i], NULL);
00315                     if (anim->pgf) {
00316                         firstvideo = i;
00317 
00318                         // get stream length
00319                         anim->avi->header->TotalFrames = AVIStreamLength(anim->pavi[i]);
00320                         
00321                         // get information about images inside the stream
00322                         l = sizeof(abFormat);
00323                         AVIStreamReadFormat(anim->pavi[i], 0, &abFormat, &l);
00324                         lpbi = (LPBITMAPINFOHEADER)abFormat;
00325                         anim->avi->header->Height = lpbi->biHeight;
00326                         anim->avi->header->Width = lpbi->biWidth;
00327                     }
00328                     else {
00329                         FIXCC(avis.fccHandler);
00330                         FIXCC(avis.fccType);
00331                         printf("Can't find AVI decoder for type : %4.4hs/%4.4hs\n",
00332                             (LPSTR)&avis.fccType,
00333                             (LPSTR)&avis.fccHandler);
00334                     }
00335                 }
00336             }
00337 
00338             // register number of opened avistreams
00339             anim->avistreams = i;
00340 
00341             //
00342             // Couldn't get any video streams out of this file
00343             //
00344             if ((anim->avistreams == 0) || (firstvideo == -1)) {
00345                 avierror = AVI_ERROR_FORMAT;
00346             }
00347             else {
00348                 avierror = AVI_ERROR_NONE;
00349                 anim->firstvideo = firstvideo;
00350             }
00351         }
00352         else {
00353             AVIFileExit();
00354         }
00355     }
00356 #endif
00357 
00358     if (avierror != AVI_ERROR_NONE) {
00359         AVI_print_error(avierror);
00360         printf ("Error loading avi: %s\n", anim->name);     
00361         free_anim_avi(anim);
00362         return -1;
00363     }
00364     
00365     anim->duration = anim->avi->header->TotalFrames;
00366     anim->params = NULL;
00367 
00368     anim->x = anim->avi->header->Width;
00369     anim->y = anim->avi->header->Height;
00370     anim->interlacing = 0;
00371     anim->orientation = 0;
00372     anim->framesize = anim->x * anim->y * 4;
00373 
00374     anim->curposition = 0;
00375     anim->preseek = 0;
00376 
00377     /*  printf("x:%d y:%d size:%d interl:%d dur:%d\n", anim->x, anim->y, anim->framesize, anim->interlacing, anim->duration);*/
00378 
00379     return 0;
00380 }
00381 
00382 static ImBuf * avi_fetchibuf (struct anim *anim, int position)
00383 {
00384     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
00385     int *tmp;
00386     int y;
00387     
00388     if (anim == NULL) return (NULL);
00389 
00390 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(FREE_WINDOWS)
00391     if (anim->avistreams) {
00392         LPBITMAPINFOHEADER lpbi;
00393 
00394         if (anim->pgf) {
00395             lpbi = AVIStreamGetFrame(anim->pgf, position + AVIStreamStart(anim->pavi[anim->firstvideo]));
00396             if (lpbi) {
00397                 ibuf = IMB_ibImageFromMemory((unsigned char *) lpbi, 100, IB_rect, "<avi_fetchibuf>");
00398 //Oh brother...
00399             }
00400         }
00401     }
00402     else {
00403 #else
00404     if (1) {
00405 #endif
00406         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (anim->x, anim->y, 24, IB_rect);
00407 
00408         tmp = AVI_read_frame (anim->avi, AVI_FORMAT_RGB32, position,
00409             AVI_get_stream(anim->avi, AVIST_VIDEO, 0));
00410         
00411         if (tmp == NULL) {
00412             printf ("Error reading frame from AVI");
00413             IMB_freeImBuf (ibuf);
00414             return NULL;
00415         }
00416 
00417         for (y=0; y < anim->y; y++) {
00418             memcpy (&(ibuf->rect)[((anim->y-y)-1)*anim->x],  &tmp[y*anim->x],  
00419                 anim->x * 4);
00420         }
00421         
00422         MEM_freeN (tmp);
00423     }
00424     
00425     ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00426     
00427     return ibuf;
00428 }
00429 
00430 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00431 
00432 extern void do_init_ffmpeg(void);
00433 
00434 static int startffmpeg(struct anim * anim)
00435 {
00436     int            i, videoStream;
00437 
00438     AVCodec *pCodec;
00439     AVFormatContext *pFormatCtx;
00440     AVCodecContext *pCodecCtx;
00441     int frs_num;
00442     double frs_den;
00443     int streamcount;
00444 
00445 #ifdef FFMPEG_SWSCALE_COLOR_SPACE_SUPPORT
00446     /* The following for color space determination */
00447     int srcRange, dstRange, brightness, contrast, saturation;
00448     int *table;
00449     const int *inv_table;
00450 #endif
00451 
00452     if (anim == 0) return(-1);
00453 
00454     streamcount = anim->streamindex;
00455 
00456     do_init_ffmpeg();
00457 
00458     if (av_open_input_file(&pFormatCtx, anim->name, NULL, 0, NULL)!=0) {
00459         return -1;
00460     }
00461 
00462     if (av_find_stream_info(pFormatCtx)<0) {
00463         av_close_input_file(pFormatCtx);
00464         return -1;
00465     }
00466 
00467     av_dump_format(pFormatCtx, 0, anim->name, 0);
00468 
00469 
00470     /* Find the video stream */
00471     videoStream = -1;
00472 
00473     for (i = 0; i < pFormatCtx->nb_streams; i++)
00474         if (pFormatCtx->streams[i]->codec->codec_type
00475            == AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO) {
00476             if (streamcount > 0) {
00477                 streamcount--;
00478                 continue;
00479             }
00480             videoStream = i;
00481             break;
00482         }
00483 
00484     if (videoStream==-1) {
00485         av_close_input_file(pFormatCtx);
00486         return -1;
00487     }
00488 
00489     pCodecCtx = pFormatCtx->streams[videoStream]->codec;
00490 
00491     /* Find the decoder for the video stream */
00492     pCodec = avcodec_find_decoder(pCodecCtx->codec_id);
00493     if (pCodec == NULL) {
00494         av_close_input_file(pFormatCtx);
00495         return -1;
00496     }
00497 
00498     pCodecCtx->workaround_bugs = 1;
00499 
00500     if (avcodec_open(pCodecCtx, pCodec) < 0) {
00501         av_close_input_file(pFormatCtx);
00502         return -1;
00503     }
00504 
00505     anim->duration = ceil(pFormatCtx->duration
00506         * av_q2d(pFormatCtx->streams[videoStream]->r_frame_rate) 
00507         / AV_TIME_BASE);
00508 
00509     frs_num = pFormatCtx->streams[videoStream]->r_frame_rate.num;
00510     frs_den = pFormatCtx->streams[videoStream]->r_frame_rate.den;
00511 
00512     frs_den *= AV_TIME_BASE;
00513 
00514     while (frs_num % 10 == 0 && frs_den >= 2.0 && frs_num > 10) {
00515         frs_num /= 10;
00516         frs_den /= 10;
00517     }
00518 
00519     anim->frs_sec = frs_num;
00520     anim->frs_sec_base = frs_den;
00521 
00522     anim->params = 0;
00523 
00524     anim->x = pCodecCtx->width;
00525     anim->y = pCodecCtx->height;
00526     anim->interlacing = 0;
00527     anim->orientation = 0;
00528     anim->framesize = anim->x * anim->y * 4;
00529 
00530     anim->curposition = -1;
00531     anim->last_frame = 0;
00532     anim->last_pts = -1;
00533     anim->next_pts = -1;
00534     anim->next_packet.stream_index = -1;
00535 
00536     anim->pFormatCtx = pFormatCtx;
00537     anim->pCodecCtx = pCodecCtx;
00538     anim->pCodec = pCodec;
00539     anim->videoStream = videoStream;
00540 
00541     anim->pFrame = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00542     anim->pFrameComplete = FALSE;
00543     anim->pFrameDeinterlaced = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00544     anim->pFrameRGB = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00545 
00546     if (avpicture_get_size(PIX_FMT_RGBA, anim->x, anim->y)
00547         != anim->x * anim->y * 4) {
00548         fprintf (stderr,
00549              "ffmpeg has changed alloc scheme ... ARGHHH!\n");
00550         avcodec_close(anim->pCodecCtx);
00551         av_close_input_file(anim->pFormatCtx);
00552         av_free(anim->pFrameRGB);
00553         av_free(anim->pFrameDeinterlaced);
00554         av_free(anim->pFrame);
00555         anim->pCodecCtx = NULL;
00556         return -1;
00557     }
00558 
00559     if (anim->ib_flags & IB_animdeinterlace) {
00560         avpicture_fill((AVPicture*) anim->pFrameDeinterlaced,
00561                        MEM_callocN(avpicture_get_size(
00562                                        anim->pCodecCtx->pix_fmt,
00563                                        anim->x, anim->y),
00564                                    "ffmpeg deinterlace"),
00565                        anim->pCodecCtx->pix_fmt, anim->x, anim->y);
00566     }
00567 
00568     if (pCodecCtx->has_b_frames) {
00569         anim->preseek = 25; /* FIXME: detect gopsize ... */
00570     }
00571     else {
00572         anim->preseek = 0;
00573     }
00574     
00575     anim->img_convert_ctx = sws_getContext(
00576         anim->pCodecCtx->width,
00577         anim->pCodecCtx->height,
00578         anim->pCodecCtx->pix_fmt,
00579         anim->pCodecCtx->width,
00580         anim->pCodecCtx->height,
00581         PIX_FMT_RGBA,
00582         SWS_FAST_BILINEAR | SWS_PRINT_INFO,
00583         NULL, NULL, NULL);
00584         
00585     if (!anim->img_convert_ctx) {
00586         fprintf (stderr,
00587              "Can't transform color space??? Bailing out...\n");
00588         avcodec_close(anim->pCodecCtx);
00589         av_close_input_file(anim->pFormatCtx);
00590         av_free(anim->pFrameRGB);
00591         av_free(anim->pFrameDeinterlaced);
00592         av_free(anim->pFrame);
00593         anim->pCodecCtx = NULL;
00594         return -1;
00595     }
00596 
00597 #ifdef FFMPEG_SWSCALE_COLOR_SPACE_SUPPORT
00598     /* Try do detect if input has 0-255 YCbCR range (JFIF Jpeg MotionJpeg) */
00599     if (!sws_getColorspaceDetails(anim->img_convert_ctx, (int**)&inv_table, &srcRange,
00600         &table, &dstRange, &brightness, &contrast, &saturation)) {
00601 
00602         srcRange = srcRange || anim->pCodecCtx->color_range == AVCOL_RANGE_JPEG;
00603         inv_table = sws_getCoefficients(anim->pCodecCtx->colorspace);
00604 
00605         if (sws_setColorspaceDetails(anim->img_convert_ctx, (int *)inv_table, srcRange,
00606             table, dstRange, brightness, contrast, saturation)) {
00607 
00608             printf("Warning: Could not set libswscale colorspace details.\n");
00609             }
00610     }
00611     else {
00612         printf("Warning: Could not set libswscale colorspace details.\n");
00613     }
00614 #endif
00615         
00616     return (0);
00617 }
00618 
00619 /* postprocess the image in anim->pFrame and do color conversion
00620  * and deinterlacing stuff.
00621  *
00622  * Output is anim->last_frame
00623  */
00624 
00625 static void ffmpeg_postprocess(struct anim * anim)
00626 {
00627     AVFrame * input = anim->pFrame;
00628     ImBuf * ibuf = anim->last_frame;
00629     int filter_y = 0;
00630 
00631     ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00632 
00633     if (!anim->pFrameComplete) {
00634         return;
00635     }
00636 
00637     /* This means the data wasnt read properly, 
00638      * this check stops crashing */
00639     if (input->data[0]==0 && input->data[1]==0 &&
00640         input->data[2]==0 && input->data[3]==0)
00641     {
00642         fprintf(stderr, "ffmpeg_fetchibuf: "
00643             "data not read properly...\n");
00644         return;
00645     }
00646 
00647     av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00648            "  POSTPROC: anim->pFrame planes: %p %p %p %p\n",
00649            input->data[0], input->data[1], input->data[2],
00650            input->data[3]);
00651 
00652 
00653     if (anim->ib_flags & IB_animdeinterlace) {
00654         if (avpicture_deinterlace(
00655                 (AVPicture*) 
00656                 anim->pFrameDeinterlaced,
00657                 (const AVPicture*)
00658                 anim->pFrame,
00659                 anim->pCodecCtx->pix_fmt,
00660                 anim->pCodecCtx->width,
00661                 anim->pCodecCtx->height)
00662             < 0) {
00663             filter_y = TRUE;
00664         }
00665         else {
00666             input = anim->pFrameDeinterlaced;
00667         }
00668     }
00669     
00670     avpicture_fill((AVPicture*) anim->pFrameRGB,
00671                    (unsigned char*) ibuf->rect,
00672                    PIX_FMT_RGBA, anim->x, anim->y);
00673 
00674     if (ENDIAN_ORDER == B_ENDIAN) {
00675         int * dstStride   = anim->pFrameRGB->linesize;
00676         uint8_t** dst     = anim->pFrameRGB->data;
00677         int dstStride2[4] = { dstStride[0], 0, 0, 0 };
00678         uint8_t* dst2[4]  = { dst[0], 0, 0, 0 };
00679         int x,y,h,w;
00680         unsigned char* bottom;
00681         unsigned char* top;
00682         
00683         sws_scale(anim->img_convert_ctx,
00684                   (const uint8_t * const *)input->data,
00685                   input->linesize,
00686                   0,
00687                   anim->pCodecCtx->height,
00688                   dst2,
00689                   dstStride2);
00690         
00691         bottom = (unsigned char*) ibuf->rect;
00692         top = bottom + ibuf->x * (ibuf->y-1) * 4;
00693         
00694         h = (ibuf->y + 1) / 2;
00695         w = ibuf->x;
00696         
00697         for (y = 0; y < h; y++) {
00698             unsigned char tmp[4];
00699             unsigned int * tmp_l =
00700                 (unsigned int*) tmp;
00701             
00702             for (x = 0; x < w; x++) {
00703                 tmp[0] = bottom[0];
00704                 tmp[1] = bottom[1];
00705                 tmp[2] = bottom[2];
00706                 tmp[3] = bottom[3];
00707                 
00708                 bottom[0] = top[0];
00709                 bottom[1] = top[1];
00710                 bottom[2] = top[2];
00711                 bottom[3] = top[3];
00712                 
00713                 *(unsigned int*) top = *tmp_l;
00714                 
00715                 bottom +=4;
00716                 top += 4;
00717             }
00718             top -= 8 * w;
00719         }
00720     }
00721     else {
00722         int * dstStride   = anim->pFrameRGB->linesize;
00723         uint8_t** dst     = anim->pFrameRGB->data;
00724         int dstStride2[4] = { -dstStride[0], 0, 0, 0 };
00725         uint8_t* dst2[4]  = { dst[0] + (anim->y - 1)*dstStride[0],
00726                       0, 0, 0 };
00727         
00728         sws_scale(anim->img_convert_ctx,
00729                   (const uint8_t * const *)input->data,
00730                   input->linesize,
00731                   0,
00732                   anim->pCodecCtx->height,
00733                   dst2,
00734                   dstStride2);
00735     }
00736 
00737     if (filter_y) {
00738         IMB_filtery(ibuf);
00739     }
00740 }
00741 
00742 /* decode one video frame also considering the packet read into next_packet */
00743 
00744 static int ffmpeg_decode_video_frame(struct anim * anim)
00745 {
00746     int rval = 0;
00747 
00748     av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "  DECODE VIDEO FRAME\n");
00749 
00750     if (anim->next_packet.stream_index == anim->videoStream) {
00751         av_free_packet(&anim->next_packet);
00752         anim->next_packet.stream_index = -1;
00753     }
00754     
00755     while ((rval = av_read_frame(anim->pFormatCtx, &anim->next_packet)) >= 0) {
00756         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, 
00757                AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00758                "%sREAD: strID=%d (VID: %d) dts=%lld pts=%lld "
00759                "%s\n",
00760                (anim->next_packet.stream_index == anim->videoStream)
00761                ? "->" : "  ",
00762                anim->next_packet.stream_index, 
00763                anim->videoStream,
00764                (anim->next_packet.dts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) ? -1:
00765                (long long int)anim->next_packet.dts,
00766                (anim->next_packet.pts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) ? -1:
00767                (long long int)anim->next_packet.pts,
00768                (anim->next_packet.flags & AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY) ? 
00769                " KEY" : "");
00770         if (anim->next_packet.stream_index == anim->videoStream) {
00771             anim->pFrameComplete = 0;
00772 
00773             avcodec_decode_video2(
00774                 anim->pCodecCtx, 
00775                 anim->pFrame, &anim->pFrameComplete, 
00776                 &anim->next_packet);
00777 
00778             if (anim->pFrameComplete) {
00779                 anim->next_pts = av_get_pts_from_frame(
00780                     anim->pFormatCtx, anim->pFrame);
00781 
00782                 av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00783                        AV_LOG_DEBUG,
00784                        "  FRAME DONE: next_pts=%lld "
00785                        "pkt_pts=%lld, guessed_pts=%lld\n",
00786                        (anim->pFrame->pts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) ?
00787                        -1 : (long long int)anim->pFrame->pts,
00788                        (anim->pFrame->pkt_pts 
00789                     == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) ?
00790                        -1 : (long long int)anim->pFrame->pkt_pts,
00791                     (long long int)anim->next_pts);
00792                 break;
00793             }
00794         }
00795         av_free_packet(&anim->next_packet);
00796         anim->next_packet.stream_index = -1;
00797     }
00798     
00799     if (rval < 0) {
00800         anim->next_packet.stream_index = -1;
00801 
00802         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00803                AV_LOG_ERROR, "  DECODE READ FAILED: av_read_frame() "
00804                "returned error: %d\n",  rval);
00805     }
00806 
00807     return (rval >= 0);
00808 }
00809 
00810 static void ffmpeg_decode_video_frame_scan(
00811     struct anim * anim, int64_t pts_to_search)
00812 {
00813     /* there seem to exist *very* silly GOP lengths out in the wild... */
00814     int count = 1000;
00815 
00816     av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00817            AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00818            "SCAN start: considering pts=%lld in search of %lld\n", 
00819            (long long int)anim->next_pts, (long long int)pts_to_search);
00820 
00821     while (count > 0 && anim->next_pts < pts_to_search) {
00822         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00823                AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00824                "  WHILE: pts=%lld in search of %lld\n", 
00825                (long long int)anim->next_pts, (long long int)pts_to_search);
00826         if (!ffmpeg_decode_video_frame(anim)) {
00827             break;
00828         }
00829         count--;
00830     }
00831     if (count == 0) {
00832         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00833                AV_LOG_ERROR, 
00834                "SCAN failed: completely lost in stream, "
00835                "bailing out at PTS=%lld, searching for PTS=%lld\n", 
00836                (long long int)anim->next_pts, (long long int)pts_to_search);
00837     }
00838     if (anim->next_pts == pts_to_search) {
00839         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00840                AV_LOG_DEBUG, "SCAN HAPPY: we found our PTS!\n");
00841     }
00842     else {
00843         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx,
00844                AV_LOG_ERROR, "SCAN UNHAPPY: PTS not matched!\n");
00845     }
00846 }
00847 
00848 static int match_format(const char *name, AVFormatContext * pFormatCtx)
00849 {
00850     const char *p;
00851     int len, namelen;
00852 
00853     const char *names = pFormatCtx->iformat->name;
00854 
00855     if (!name || !names)
00856         return 0;
00857 
00858     namelen = strlen(name);
00859     while ((p = strchr(names, ','))) {
00860         len = MAX2(p - names, namelen);
00861         if (!BLI_strncasecmp(name, names, len))
00862             return 1;
00863         names = p+1;
00864     }
00865     return !BLI_strcasecmp(name, names);
00866 }
00867 
00868 static int ffmpeg_seek_by_byte(AVFormatContext *pFormatCtx)
00869 {
00870     static const char * byte_seek_list [] = { "mpegts", 0 };
00871     const char ** p;
00872 
00873     if (pFormatCtx->iformat->flags & AVFMT_TS_DISCONT) {
00874         return TRUE;
00875     }
00876 
00877     p = byte_seek_list;
00878 
00879     while (*p) {
00880         if (match_format(*p++, pFormatCtx)) {
00881             return TRUE;
00882         }
00883     }
00884 
00885     return FALSE;
00886 }
00887 
00888 static ImBuf * ffmpeg_fetchibuf(struct anim * anim, int position,
00889                 IMB_Timecode_Type tc) {
00890     int64_t pts_to_search = 0;
00891     double frame_rate;
00892     double pts_time_base;
00893     long long st_time; 
00894     struct anim_index * tc_index = 0;
00895     AVStream * v_st;
00896     int new_frame_index = 0; /* To quite gcc barking... */
00897     int old_frame_index = 0; /* To quite gcc barking... */
00898 
00899     if (anim == 0) return (0);
00900 
00901     av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "FETCH: pos=%d\n", position);
00902 
00903     if (tc != IMB_TC_NONE) {
00904         tc_index = IMB_anim_open_index(anim, tc);
00905     }
00906 
00907     v_st = anim->pFormatCtx->streams[anim->videoStream];
00908 
00909     frame_rate = av_q2d(v_st->r_frame_rate);
00910 
00911     st_time = anim->pFormatCtx->start_time;
00912     pts_time_base = av_q2d(v_st->time_base);
00913 
00914     if (tc_index) {
00915         new_frame_index = IMB_indexer_get_frame_index(
00916             tc_index, position);
00917         old_frame_index = IMB_indexer_get_frame_index(
00918             tc_index, anim->curposition);
00919         pts_to_search = IMB_indexer_get_pts(
00920             tc_index, new_frame_index);
00921     }
00922     else {
00923         pts_to_search = (long long) 
00924             floor(((double) position) 
00925                   / pts_time_base / frame_rate + 0.5);
00926 
00927         if (st_time != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
00928             pts_to_search += st_time / pts_time_base 
00929                 / AV_TIME_BASE;
00930         }
00931     }
00932 
00933     av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00934            "FETCH: looking for PTS=%lld "
00935            "(pts_timebase=%g, frame_rate=%g, st_time=%lld)\n", 
00936            (long long int)pts_to_search,pts_time_base, frame_rate, st_time);
00937 
00938     if (anim->last_frame && 
00939         anim->last_pts <= pts_to_search && anim->next_pts > pts_to_search) {
00940         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00941                "FETCH: frame repeat: last: %lld next: %lld\n",
00942                (long long int)anim->last_pts, 
00943                (long long int)anim->next_pts);
00944         IMB_refImBuf(anim->last_frame);
00945         anim->curposition = position;
00946         return anim->last_frame;
00947     }
00948      
00949     if (position > anim->curposition + 1 &&
00950         anim->preseek &&
00951         !tc_index &&
00952         position - (anim->curposition + 1) < anim->preseek)
00953     {
00954         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00955                "FETCH: within preseek interval (no index)\n");
00956 
00957         ffmpeg_decode_video_frame_scan(anim, pts_to_search);
00958     }
00959     else if (tc_index &&
00960            IMB_indexer_can_scan(tc_index, old_frame_index,
00961                     new_frame_index)) {
00962 
00963         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00964                "FETCH: within preseek interval "
00965                "(index tells us)\n");
00966 
00967         ffmpeg_decode_video_frame_scan(anim, pts_to_search);
00968     }
00969     else if (position != anim->curposition + 1) {
00970         long long pos;
00971         int ret;
00972 
00973         if (tc_index) {
00974             unsigned long long dts;
00975 
00976             pos = IMB_indexer_get_seek_pos(
00977                 tc_index, new_frame_index);
00978             dts = IMB_indexer_get_seek_pos_dts(
00979                 tc_index, new_frame_index);
00980 
00981             av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00982                    "TC INDEX seek pos = %lld\n", pos);
00983             av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00984                    "TC INDEX seek dts = %lld\n", dts);
00985 
00986             if (ffmpeg_seek_by_byte(anim->pFormatCtx)) {
00987                 av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00988                        "... using BYTE pos\n");
00989 
00990                 ret = av_seek_frame(anim->pFormatCtx, 
00991                             -1,
00992                             pos, AVSEEK_FLAG_BYTE);
00993                 av_update_cur_dts(anim->pFormatCtx, v_st, dts);
00994             }
00995             else {
00996                 av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
00997                        "... using DTS pos\n");
00998                 ret = av_seek_frame(anim->pFormatCtx, 
00999                             anim->videoStream, 
01000                             dts, AVSEEK_FLAG_BACKWARD);
01001             }
01002         }
01003         else {
01004             pos = (long long) (position - anim->preseek) 
01005                 * AV_TIME_BASE / frame_rate;
01006 
01007             av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
01008                    "NO INDEX seek pos = %lld, st_time = %lld\n", 
01009                    pos, (st_time != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) ? st_time : 0);
01010 
01011             if (pos < 0) {
01012                 pos = 0;
01013             }
01014         
01015             if (st_time != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
01016                 pos += st_time;
01017             }
01018 
01019             av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
01020                    "NO INDEX final seek pos = %lld\n", pos);
01021 
01022             ret = av_seek_frame(anim->pFormatCtx, -1, 
01023                         pos, AVSEEK_FLAG_BACKWARD);
01024         }
01025 
01026         if (ret < 0) {
01027             av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_ERROR,
01028                    "FETCH: "
01029                    "error while seeking to DTS = %lld "
01030                    "(frameno = %d, PTS = %lld): errcode = %d\n",
01031                    pos, position, (long long int)pts_to_search, ret);
01032         }
01033 
01034         avcodec_flush_buffers(anim->pCodecCtx);
01035 
01036         anim->next_pts = -1;
01037 
01038         if (anim->next_packet.stream_index == anim->videoStream) {
01039             av_free_packet(&anim->next_packet);
01040             anim->next_packet.stream_index = -1;
01041         }
01042 
01043         /* memset(anim->pFrame,...) ?? */
01044 
01045         if (ret >= 0) {
01046             ffmpeg_decode_video_frame_scan(anim, pts_to_search);
01047         }
01048     }
01049     else if (position == 0 && anim->curposition == -1) {
01050         /* first frame without seeking special case... */
01051         ffmpeg_decode_video_frame(anim);
01052     }
01053     else {
01054         av_log(anim->pFormatCtx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, 
01055                "FETCH: no seek necessary, just continue...\n");
01056     }
01057 
01058     IMB_freeImBuf(anim->last_frame);
01059     anim->last_frame = IMB_allocImBuf(anim->x, anim->y, 32, IB_rect);
01060 
01061     ffmpeg_postprocess(anim);
01062 
01063     anim->last_pts = anim->next_pts;
01064     
01065     ffmpeg_decode_video_frame(anim);
01066     
01067     anim->curposition = position;
01068     
01069     IMB_refImBuf(anim->last_frame);
01070 
01071     return anim->last_frame;
01072 }
01073 
01074 static void free_anim_ffmpeg(struct anim * anim)
01075 {
01076     if (anim == NULL) return;
01077 
01078     if (anim->pCodecCtx) {
01079         avcodec_close(anim->pCodecCtx);
01080         av_close_input_file(anim->pFormatCtx);
01081         av_free(anim->pFrameRGB);
01082         av_free(anim->pFrame);
01083 
01084         if (anim->ib_flags & IB_animdeinterlace) {
01085             MEM_freeN(anim->pFrameDeinterlaced->data[0]);
01086         }
01087         av_free(anim->pFrameDeinterlaced);
01088         sws_freeContext(anim->img_convert_ctx);
01089         IMB_freeImBuf(anim->last_frame);
01090         if (anim->next_packet.stream_index != -1) {
01091             av_free_packet(&anim->next_packet);
01092         }
01093     }
01094     anim->duration = 0;
01095 }
01096 
01097 #endif
01098 
01099 #ifdef WITH_REDCODE
01100 
01101 static int startredcode(struct anim * anim)
01102 {
01103     anim->redcodeCtx = redcode_open(anim->name);
01104     if (!anim->redcodeCtx) {
01105         return -1;
01106     }
01107     anim->duration = redcode_get_length(anim->redcodeCtx);
01108     
01109     return 0;
01110 }
01111 
01112 static ImBuf * redcode_fetchibuf(struct anim * anim, int position)
01113 {
01114     struct ImBuf * ibuf;
01115     struct redcode_frame * frame;
01116     struct redcode_frame_raw * raw_frame;
01117 
01118     if (!anim->redcodeCtx) {
01119         return NULL;
01120     }
01121 
01122     frame = redcode_read_video_frame(anim->redcodeCtx, position);
01123     
01124     if (!frame) {
01125         return NULL;
01126     }
01127 
01128     raw_frame = redcode_decode_video_raw(frame, 1);
01129 
01130     redcode_free_frame(frame);
01131 
01132     if (!raw_frame) {
01133         return NULL;
01134     }
01135     
01136         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(raw_frame->width * 2, 
01137                               raw_frame->height * 2, 32, IB_rectfloat);
01138 
01139     redcode_decode_video_float(raw_frame, ibuf->rect_float, 1);
01140 
01141     return ibuf;
01142 }
01143 
01144 static void free_anim_redcode(struct anim * anim)
01145 {
01146     if (anim->redcodeCtx) {
01147         redcode_close(anim->redcodeCtx);
01148         anim->redcodeCtx = 0;
01149     }
01150     anim->duration = 0;
01151 }
01152 
01153 #endif
01154 
01155 /* probeer volgende plaatje te lezen */
01156 /* Geen plaatje, probeer dan volgende animatie te openen */
01157 /* gelukt, haal dan eerste plaatje van animatie */
01158 
01159 static struct ImBuf * anim_getnew(struct anim * anim)
01160 {
01161     struct ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
01162 
01163     if (anim == NULL) return(NULL);
01164 
01165     free_anim_movie(anim);
01166     free_anim_avi(anim);
01167 #ifdef WITH_QUICKTIME
01168     free_anim_quicktime(anim);
01169 #endif
01170 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
01171     free_anim_ffmpeg(anim);
01172 #endif
01173 #ifdef WITH_REDCODE
01174     free_anim_redcode(anim);
01175 #endif
01176 
01177 
01178     if (anim->curtype != 0) return (NULL);
01179     anim->curtype = imb_get_anim_type(anim->name);  
01180 
01181     switch (anim->curtype) {
01182     case ANIM_SEQUENCE:
01183         ibuf = IMB_loadiffname(anim->name, anim->ib_flags);
01184         if (ibuf) {
01185             BLI_strncpy(anim->first, anim->name, sizeof(anim->first));
01186             anim->duration = 1;
01187         }
01188         break;
01189     case ANIM_MOVIE:
01190         if (startmovie(anim)) return (NULL);
01191         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (anim->x, anim->y, 24, 0); /* fake */
01192         break;
01193     case ANIM_AVI:
01194         if (startavi(anim)) {
01195             printf("couldnt start avi\n"); 
01196             return (NULL);
01197         }
01198         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (anim->x, anim->y, 24, 0);
01199         break;
01200 #ifdef WITH_QUICKTIME
01201     case ANIM_QTIME:
01202         if (startquicktime(anim)) return (0);
01203         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (anim->x, anim->y, 24, 0);
01204         break;
01205 #endif
01206 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
01207     case ANIM_FFMPEG:
01208         if (startffmpeg(anim)) return (0);
01209         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (anim->x, anim->y, 24, 0);
01210         break;
01211 #endif
01212 #ifdef WITH_REDCODE
01213     case ANIM_REDCODE:
01214         if (startredcode(anim)) return (0);
01215         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (8, 8, 32, 0);
01216         break;
01217 #endif
01218     }
01219     return(ibuf);
01220 }
01221 
01222 struct ImBuf * IMB_anim_previewframe(struct anim * anim)
01223 {
01224     struct ImBuf * ibuf = NULL;
01225     int position = 0;
01226     
01227     ibuf = IMB_anim_absolute(anim, 0, IMB_TC_NONE, IMB_PROXY_NONE);
01228     if (ibuf) {
01229         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01230         position = anim->duration / 2;
01231         ibuf = IMB_anim_absolute(anim, position, IMB_TC_NONE,
01232                      IMB_PROXY_NONE);
01233     }
01234     return ibuf;
01235 }
01236 
01237 struct ImBuf * IMB_anim_absolute(struct anim * anim, int position,
01238                  IMB_Timecode_Type tc,
01239                  IMB_Proxy_Size preview_size) {
01240     struct ImBuf * ibuf = NULL;
01241     char head[256], tail[256];
01242     unsigned short digits;
01243     int pic;
01244     int filter_y;
01245     if (anim == NULL) return(NULL);
01246 
01247     filter_y = (anim->ib_flags & IB_animdeinterlace);
01248 
01249     if (anim->curtype == 0) {
01250         ibuf = anim_getnew(anim);
01251         if (ibuf == NULL) {
01252             return(NULL);
01253         }
01254 
01255         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf); /* ???? */
01256         ibuf= NULL;
01257     }
01258 
01259     if (position < 0) return(NULL);
01260     if (position >= anim->duration) return(NULL);
01261 
01262     if (preview_size != IMB_PROXY_NONE) {
01263         struct anim * proxy = IMB_anim_open_proxy(anim, preview_size);
01264 
01265         if (proxy) {
01266             position = IMB_anim_index_get_frame_index(
01267                 anim, tc, position);
01268             return IMB_anim_absolute(
01269                 proxy, position,
01270                 IMB_TC_NONE, IMB_PROXY_NONE);
01271         }
01272     }
01273 
01274     switch(anim->curtype) {
01275     case ANIM_SEQUENCE:
01276         pic = an_stringdec(anim->first, head, tail, &digits);
01277         pic += position;
01278         an_stringenc(anim->name, head, tail, digits, pic);
01279         ibuf = IMB_loadiffname(anim->name, IB_rect);
01280         if (ibuf) {
01281             anim->curposition = position;
01282         }
01283         break;
01284     case ANIM_MOVIE:
01285         ibuf = movie_fetchibuf(anim, position);
01286         if (ibuf) {
01287             anim->curposition = position;
01288             IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(ibuf);
01289             ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
01290         }
01291         break;
01292     case ANIM_AVI:
01293         ibuf = avi_fetchibuf(anim, position);
01294         if (ibuf)
01295             anim->curposition = position;
01296         break;
01297 #ifdef WITH_QUICKTIME
01298     case ANIM_QTIME:
01299         ibuf = qtime_fetchibuf(anim, position);
01300         if (ibuf)
01301             anim->curposition = position;
01302         break;
01303 #endif
01304 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
01305     case ANIM_FFMPEG:
01306         ibuf = ffmpeg_fetchibuf(anim, position, tc);
01307         if (ibuf)
01308             anim->curposition = position;
01309         filter_y = 0; /* done internally */
01310         break;
01311 #endif
01312 #ifdef WITH_REDCODE
01313     case ANIM_REDCODE:
01314         ibuf = redcode_fetchibuf(anim, position);
01315         if (ibuf) anim->curposition = position;
01316         break;
01317 #endif
01318     }
01319 
01320     if (ibuf) {
01321         if (filter_y) IMB_filtery(ibuf);
01322         BLI_snprintf(ibuf->name, sizeof(ibuf->name), "%s.%04d", anim->name, anim->curposition + 1);
01323         
01324     }
01325     return(ibuf);
01326 }
01327 
01328 /***/
01329 
01330 int IMB_anim_get_duration(struct anim *anim, IMB_Timecode_Type tc)
01331 {
01332     struct anim_index * idx;
01333     if (tc == IMB_TC_NONE) {
01334         return anim->duration;
01335     }
01336     
01337     idx = IMB_anim_open_index(anim, tc);
01338     if (!idx) {
01339         return anim->duration;
01340     }
01341 
01342     return IMB_indexer_get_duration(idx);
01343 }
01344 
01345 int IMB_anim_get_fps(struct anim * anim, 
01346              short * frs_sec, float * frs_sec_base)
01347 {
01348     if (anim->frs_sec) {
01349         *frs_sec = anim->frs_sec;
01350         *frs_sec_base = anim->frs_sec_base;
01351         return TRUE;
01352     }
01353     return FALSE;
01354 }
01355 
01356 void IMB_anim_set_preseek(struct anim * anim, int preseek)
01357 {
01358     anim->preseek = preseek;
01359 }
01360 
01361 int IMB_anim_get_preseek(struct anim * anim)
01362 {
01363     return anim->preseek;
01364 }
